<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H0377|אִישׁ]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אשׁ‎</span> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 55, 5 c</sup>] **noun masculine**<sup>[[Ezra.6.3|Ezra 6:3]]</sup> ==foundation== (probably loan-word from Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***uššû***</u></abbr>, ***id.***, √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אשׁשׁ‎</span> (see Biblical Hebrew), so [[BDB#Zim|Zim]]<sup>KAT 3. 649</sup>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוּשָׁא‎</span>, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוּשָׁה‎</span>, Christian- Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 19</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 99</sup>); — plural emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֻשַּׁיָּא‎</span> [[Ezra.4.12|Ezra 4:12]]; [[Ezra.5.16|Ezra 5:16]] suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֻשֹּׁהִי‎</span> [[Ezra.6.3|Ezra 6:3]].
